title: Near Protocol: Unlocking the Future – NEAR Price Prediction 2025-2030
body: BitcoinWorld Near Protocol: Unlocking the Future – NEAR Price Prediction 2025-2030 The world of decentralized finance (DeFi) and Web3 is constantly evolving, with new platforms emerging to redefine how we interact with technology. Among these, Near Protocol stands out as a formidable player, aiming to simplify blockchain adoption for developers and users alike. As interest in high-performance, scalable blockchain solutions grows, many are asking: What does the future hold for NEAR? This comprehensive guide delves into the NEAR price prediction for the coming years, exploring the factors that could drive its value and whether a significant surge is on the horizon for NEAR crypto . Understanding Near Protocol: The Foundation of Future Growth Before we dive into numbers, it is crucial to understand what makes Near Protocol unique. It is a layer-one blockchain designed for scalability and usability, focusing on developer-friendliness and seamless user experiences. Unlike many complex blockchain environments, Near aims to be an intuitive platform where developers can build decentralized applications (dApps) without extensive prior blockchain knowledge. Its core technology, Nightshade sharding, allows the network to process transactions in parallel, significantly boosting its capacity and speed. Key aspects that define Near Protocol include: Sharding Technology: Nightshade enables dynamic scaling, allowing the network to expand its processing power as demand grows. Developer Experience: Supports familiar programming languages like Rust and AssemblyScript, lowering the barrier to entry for developers. Usability for End-Users: Features like human-readable account names (e.g., ‘yourname.near’) and transaction fee abstraction (users don’t always pay gas directly) enhance user experience. Ecosystem Focus: A strong emphasis on fostering a vibrant ecosystem of dApps, wallets, and infrastructure projects. These foundational strengths are vital for any long-term crypto price forecast , as they dictate the project’s utility and potential for widespread adoption. Current Market Dynamics and NEAR Crypto Performance The cryptocurrency market is known for its volatility, and NEAR crypto is no exception. Its price movements are influenced by broader market trends, investor sentiment, technological developments within the Near ecosystem, and competitive pressures. Historically, NEAR has shown periods of significant growth, especially during bullish market cycles, demonstrating its potential to capture investor interest. When evaluating the current performance, it is important to consider: Market Capitalization: A higher market cap often indicates greater stability and investor confidence. Trading Volume: Healthy trading volumes suggest liquidity and active interest in the NEAR token . Ecosystem Development: New dApp launches, partnerships, and upgrades within the Near Protocol ecosystem can positively impact its value. Macroeconomic Factors: Global economic conditions, inflation rates, and regulatory news can sway the entire crypto market, including NEAR. Understanding these dynamics provides a baseline for any credible NEAR price prediction , allowing us to contextualize future projections within the current landscape. Factors Driving the NEAR Price Prediction 2025-2030 Several critical factors will shape the trajectory of Near Protocol and its native token, NEAR, in the coming years. These elements contribute to the overall utility and demand for the platform, directly impacting its market value. Technological Advancements: The Core of NEAR Protocol’s Edge Near’s commitment to innovation, particularly with its Nightshade sharding, is a major driver. As the network further refines its sharding implementation and introduces new features, its ability to scale efficiently will attract more developers and users. Continued improvements in transaction speed, cost-effectiveness, and security will solidify Near’s position as a leading blockchain for Web3 development. Any breakthroughs in these areas will provide a strong tailwind for the NEAR price prediction . Ecosystem Growth and Adoption: Fueling NEAR Crypto Demand The strength of a blockchain often lies in its ecosystem. The growth of dApps, DeFi protocols, NFTs, and gaming projects built on Near Protocol directly translates to increased utility and demand for the NEAR token . Strategic partnerships, grants for developers, and successful marketing campaigns to onboard new users will be crucial. As more projects choose Near for its scalability and user-friendly environment, the demand for NEAR to pay for transaction fees, staking, and governance will naturally increase, positively impacting the NEAR crypto value. Market Sentiment and Broader Crypto Trends: What Does the Crypto Price Forecast Say? The overall sentiment in the cryptocurrency market plays a significant role. A bullish market cycle, often driven by institutional adoption, clearer regulations, or technological advancements across the industry, tends to lift all boats, including NEAR. Conversely, bearish trends can exert downward pressure. Monitoring the broader crypto price forecast and understanding market cycles is essential for anticipating NEAR’s movements. Factors like Bitcoin’s performance, global economic stability, and regulatory clarity will continue to influence investor confidence in altcoins like NEAR. Competition and Regulatory Landscape: Navigating Challenges for the NEAR Token The blockchain space is highly competitive, with numerous Layer 1 protocols vying for market share. Near Protocol must continue to innovate and differentiate itself to maintain its edge against competitors like Ethereum, Solana, and Avalanche. Additionally, the evolving regulatory landscape globally could introduce challenges or opportunities. Clearer regulations could foster greater institutional investment, while restrictive policies might hinder growth. The ability of Near Protocol to adapt to these external pressures will be vital for its long-term success and the stability of the NEAR token . NEAR Price Prediction 2025: A Look at the Mid-Term Horizon As we approach 2025, several factors could converge to shape the NEAR price prediction . The continued maturation of its sharding technology, coupled with an expanding ecosystem of dApps, could drive significant user adoption. If the broader crypto market enters a sustained bullish phase, fueled by macroeconomic improvements or increasing institutional interest, Near Protocol is well-positioned to capitalize on this momentum. In 2025, we might see: Increased Network Activity: More dApps launching and higher transaction volumes. Stronger Developer Community: Continued growth in developer tools and resources. Potential for Strategic Partnerships: Collaborations with major Web2 companies or other blockchain protocols. Analysts often project a conservative yet steady growth for NEAR crypto in the mid-term, with potential for more aggressive surges if specific catalysts, such as a major technological upgrade or a widespread adoption wave, materialize. A 2X surge from current levels by 2025 is certainly within the realm of possibility, contingent on favorable market conditions and strong execution by the Near team. NEAR Price Prediction 2026-2030: Long-Term Growth Potential Looking further out to 2026 and beyond, the long-term outlook for Near Protocol appears promising, assuming it continues to deliver on its roadmap and adapt to market changes. By 2030, the Web3 landscape is expected to be significantly more developed, with blockchain technology integrated into various aspects of daily life. Near’s focus on usability and scalability positions it well to be a foundational layer for this future. Key drivers for the long-term NEAR price prediction include: Mass Adoption of Web3: If Web3 truly goes mainstream, platforms like Near, which prioritize user experience, will be at the forefront. Interoperability Solutions: Near’s ability to seamlessly interact with other blockchains (e.g., through bridges like Rainbow Bridge) will enhance its utility. Decentralized Governance: The maturation of Near’s decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) will ensure community-driven development and resilience. Inflationary/Deflationary Mechanisms: How the supply of the NEAR token is managed over time will also influence its value. A significant crypto price forecast for Near Protocol in this timeframe often anticipates substantial growth, potentially seeing the token reach new all-time highs as its ecosystem expands and Web3 adoption accelerates. While a 2X surge is a near-term possibility, the long-term potential for multiple X gains exists if Near becomes a dominant player in the decentralized internet. Is NEAR Protocol a Good Investment? Weighing Potential and Risks The question of whether Near Protocol represents a good investment depends on individual risk tolerance, investment horizon, and market outlook. The project has strong fundamentals, a clear vision for Web3, and a dedicated development team. Its technological approach to scalability and user-friendliness gives it a competitive edge. However, like all cryptocurrency investments, it comes with risks: Market Volatility: Prices can fluctuate wildly, leading to potential losses. Competition: The Layer 1 space is crowded, and innovation from competitors could challenge Near’s position. Regulatory Uncertainty: Future government regulations could impact the entire crypto market. Technical Risks: While robust, any blockchain can face unforeseen technical challenges or security vulnerabilities. For those who believe in the future of Web3 and the importance of scalable, user-friendly blockchain infrastructure, Near Protocol offers a compelling investment thesis. It is crucial to conduct thorough due diligence and consider these risks before making any investment decisions. A diversified portfolio is always recommended. Actionable Insights for Navigating the NEAR Crypto Market For investors and enthusiasts looking to engage with NEAR crypto , here are some actionable insights: Stay Informed: Regularly follow official Near Protocol announcements, roadmap updates, and ecosystem developments. Monitor Market Trends: Keep an eye on broader cryptocurrency market sentiment and macroeconomic indicators that influence the overall crypto price forecast . Consider Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): Instead of a lump sum investment, consider investing a fixed amount regularly to mitigate volatility risks. Understand Staking: If you hold NEAR token , consider staking it to earn rewards and contribute to network security, while also reducing selling pressure. Risk Management: Never invest more than you can afford to lose, and diversify your portfolio across different assets. These strategies can help you make more informed decisions regarding your engagement with Near Protocol and its potential future value. Conclusion: The Bright Future of Near Protocol The journey of Near Protocol from its inception to its current standing reflects a strong commitment to building a scalable, user-friendly foundation for the decentralized web. Our NEAR price prediction for 2025-2030 suggests a significant growth trajectory, with the potential for NEAR crypto to achieve a 2X surge in the mid-term and even greater gains in the long run. This optimistic outlook is underpinned by its robust technology, growing ecosystem, and strategic focus on developer and user experience. While the path ahead will undoubtedly have its challenges, Near Protocol is well-equipped to navigate the evolving crypto landscape and cement its position as a key player in the Web3 revolution. Its innovative approach to sharding and dedication to accessibility make it a project worth watching closely as the digital future unfolds. To learn more about the latest crypto markets trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Near Protocol institutional adoption. This post Near Protocol: Unlocking the Future – NEAR Price Prediction 2025-2030 first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Zinsschock oder Kursexplosion? Bitcoin vor der Entscheidung
body: Der Markt wartet gespannt auf die Zinsentscheidung der US-Notenbank. Im Vorfeld zeigt Bitcoin eine auffällige Stärke. Nach einem Rücksetzer konnte der Support gehalten werden, wodurch sich der Kurs erneut nach oben bewegte. Besonders der Ausbruch über eine diagonale Trendlinie gab den Bullen kurzfristig Rückenwind. Das Ziel bei rund 117.400 US-Dollar wurde jedoch knapp verfehlt. Der Chart zeigt eine bullische Flagge, die Raum für weitere Anstiege lassen könnte. Bitcoin Bullflag, Quelle: www.tradnigview.com Die Unsicherheit bleibt. Kommt eine Zinssenkung von 0,5 Prozent, wäre ein explosives Szenario nach Norden denkbar, möglicherweise sogar neue Allzeithochs. Bei nur 0,25 Prozent und einer mahnenden Rede von Jerome Powell droht dagegen ein Abverkauf. Anleger müssen sich also auf starke Schwankungen einstellen. Unterstützungen und Widerstände sind in dieser Lage entscheidend, um klare Setups zu finden. Widerstände im Blick Die entscheidende Zone liegt im Bereich von 119.000 bis 123.000 US-Dollar. Erst wenn Bitcoin diese Hürde nachhaltig überwindet, könnte der Weg frei sein für ein Schließen aller offenen Gaps und einen größeren Aufwärtsschub. Scheitert der Kurs an diesem Bereich, droht ein Rückfall in die Region um 113.000 oder sogar 100.000 US-Dollar. Charttechnisch verstärken sich die Risiken, da eine bearishe Divergenz auf dem Vierstunden-Chart sichtbar ist – steigende Kurse, aber ein schwächerer RSI. For those still fooled thinking the bull is “about to start” wake up. It started in Jan 2023. BTC has been moving up for 2 years and 8 months! In 2015-2017 bull market lasted 820d2019-2021 bull market lasted 1004dCurrent "bull market" lasting 1035d.. You’re late! — Doctor Profit 🇨🇭 (@DrProfitCrypto) September 15, 2025 Kurzfristig bleibt der Markt also ein Spiel zwischen Geduld und Reaktionsgeschwindigkeit. Trader beobachten engmaschig die Bewegungen rund um diese Zonen. Auch die Entwicklung anderer Märkte wie S&P 500, Nasdaq oder Edelmetalle spielt eine Rolle, da sie stark mit der US-Geldpolitik verknüpft sind. Ethereum kämpft mit wichtigen Marken Ethereum verläuft ähnlich wie Bitcoin. Nach einem Rücksetzer konnte die Tageskerze oberhalb einer wichtigen diagonalen Linie schließen – ein positives Signal. Kurzfristig ist ein Anstieg bis in den Bereich zwischen 4.615 und 4.640 US-Dollar möglich. Erst über dieser Zone wäre der Weg zu 4.700 und darüber hinaus frei. Doch auch bei Ethereum ist Vorsicht angesagt. Fällt der Kurs unter 4.333 oder gar 4.200, könnten weitere 15 Prozent Verlust folgen, mit Kursen bis in den Bereich um 3.600 US-Dollar. Das eröffnet langfristig neue Einstiegschancen, kurzfristig droht aber Druck auf die gesamte Altcoin-Landschaft. Die Marktlogik bleibt also dieselbe: Überraschende Zinsschritte könnten für Rallys sorgen, während warnende Worte der Notenbank die Kurse belasten. In beiden Fällen reagieren Kryptowährungen besonders heftig. Gerade diese Unsicherheit macht die Nebenwerte spannend. Nach jeder größeren Bitcoin-Korrektur hatten Altcoins in den vergangenen Zyklen das Potenzial, überproportional zu steigen. Projekte mit innovativen Ansätzen nutzen die Marktphasen, um Investoren, die auf den Aufschwung hoffen, schon vorzeitig abzuholen. Ein Top-Beispiel ist hier Pepe Node ($PEPENODE). Das neue Projekt vereint spielerisches Mining von Memecoins mit einem Krypto Presale und bringt damit enormes Potenzial für einen Bullenmarkt. Das Projekt setzt nicht auf klassische Coud-Mining-Modelle, die in der Vergangenheit durch Skandale aufgefallen waren. Stattdessen kombiniert es Mining mit einem spielerischen Ansatz. Nutzer können virtuelle Mining-Setups aufbauen, upgraden und damit Meme-Coins wie Pepe oder Fartcoin verdienen. Ein entscheidender Mechanismus ist dabei die Deflation: 70 Prozent aller eingesetzten PEPENODE-Token beim Upgraden werden dauerhaft verbrannt. Dadurch sinkt das Angebot kontinuierlich. Zudem können Käufer ihre Tokens bereits im Presale staken mit dynamischen Renditen von über 1.100 Prozent pro Jahr (zum aktuellen Zeitpunkt). Damit entsteht eine seltene Kombination: frühzeitige Belohnungen und ein deflationäres Modell, das langfristig Druck auf den Kurs ausüben könnte. Mit inzwischen über 1,2 Millionen US-Dollar eingesammeltem Kapital zeigt PepeNode, wie stark das Interesse an innovativen Meme-Projekten derzeit ist. Auch wenn das Risiko eines Memecoins mitschwingt, scheinbar glauben viele Investoren an einen Altcoin Bullrun und an den Anstieg von PepeNode. Hier PepeNode Token im Presale kaufen. Hinweis: Investieren ist spekulativ. Bei der Anlage ist Ihr Kapital in Gefahr. Diese Website ist nicht für die Verwendung in Rechtsordnungen vorgesehen, in denen der beschriebene Handel oder die beschriebenen Investitionen verboten sind, und sollte nur von Personen und auf gesetzlich zulässige Weise verwendet werden. Ihre Investition ist in Ihrem Land oder Wohnsitzstaat möglicherweise nicht für den Anlegerschutz geeignet. Führen Sie daher Ihre eigene Due Diligence durch. Diese Website steht Ihnen kostenlos zur Verfügung, wir erhalten jedoch möglicherweise Provisionen von den Unternehmen, die wir auf dieser Website anbieten.

title: Forward Industries: Assessing The Biggest Solana Digital Asset Treasury
body: Summary Forward Industries has become the largest Solana DAT, acquiring over 6.8 million SOL after a $1.65B PIPE investment. FORD's pivot to Solana follows years of declining revenues and negative net income, with its SOL holdings now exceeding $1.58B in value. Despite staking SOL for a 6.8% yield, FORD trades at over 30x forward sales, suggesting the stock is significantly overvalued at current prices. I rate FORD as a 'hold,' preferring a moderate premium to the PIPE price over the current ~$40 share price for SOL exposure. As I laid out in my recent Solana ( SOL-USD ) piece highlighting the impending SOL purchases through public equities, we have a new leader in the race to be the biggest Solana DAT, or Digital Asset Treasury company. That crown is currently worn by Forward Industries (FORD), which recently purchased over 6.8 million SOL tokens following a PIPE investment from Multicoin Capital, Galaxy Digital (GLXY), and Jump Crypto. In this piece, we'll look at some of the key details of those investments and assess whether FORD shares are a 'buy,' 'hold,' or 'sell' at the present time. Forward Industries As has often been the case in some of the more recent examples from the DAT craze this summer, the public companies that transition to the DAT model often have very little in the way of assets or profitable business lines prior to shifting to crypto. Such is the case for Forward Industries, which previously operated a product design business for medical and technology companies. Data by YCharts In addition to declining revenues going back at least the last 3 years, Forward Industries has had negative net income for 7 consecutive quarters. Thus, a timely pivot to Solana was aided by a massive capital raise. The PIPE Through a private investment in public equity, or PIPE, Forward Industries was able to raise approximately $1.65 billion from various investors at a price of $18.50 per share. The proceeds from that PIPE were to purchase Solana for the company's SOL strategy. On September 15th, the company announced over 6.8 million SOL tokens purchased with the proceeds from that PIPE. That amount of SOL currently makes Forward Industries the largest Solana DAT by a wide margin. In fact, not including Helius Medical Technologies (HSDT), which is also raising millions of dollars for a SOL treasury, Forward Industries has a bigger SOL balance than the previous 8 SOL DAT companies combined: Entities Total Solana Market Value DeFi Development Corp. ( DFDV ) 2,027,817 $470,453,544 Upexi ( UPXI ) 2,018,419 $468,273,208 Sharps Technology ( STSS ) 2,000,000 $464,000,000 Sol Strategies ( STKE ) 370,420 $85,937,440 BIT Mining Limited ( BTCM ) 44,412 $10,303,584 Exodus Movement ( EXOD ) 43,738 $10,147,216 Torrent Capital ( OTCPK:TRRPF ) 40,039 $9,289,048 Lion Group Holding ( LGHL ) 6,629 $1,537,928 Combined 6,551,474 Forward Industries 6,822,000 $1,582,704,000 Source: CoinGecko, values at $232 SOL price Subsequent to the PIPE, Forward Industries raised another $32.9 million through a direct investment at $18.50 per share. Per that prospectus , there are now 84,527,120 shares outstanding. This is an important number because it implies an equity valuation of $3.3 billion at a $39 closing price on September 15th. Should the company really be worth that much? I'm not convinced. Valuation Given the company's $3.3 billion valuation relative to the $1.6 billion SOL that the company holds, it would be fair to call FORD overvalued at a 2x mNAV multiple if it were a DAT that held a non-productive asset. However, the company has put the SOL to work through native staking. Meaning, these tokens do generate a yield on top of any price appreciation that they might produce. 1 yr Solana APYs ( Staking Rewards ) Presently, staked Solana generates 6.8% annually. Keep in mind, as more Solana is purchased and subsequently staked for income, the yields from staking come down, similar to how a bond yield would come down when the price of the bond increases. But at 6.8%, we can at least model a price-to-sales multiple for FORD based on expected annual revenue from staking. Current SOL holdings: $1,582,704,000 Staking Yield 6.8% Annualized revenue $107,623,872 Market Capitalization $3,296,557,680 FWD P/S Multiple 30.63 Source: Author's calculations Assuming the staking yield stays the same and the price of SOL doesn't deviate from current levels, FORD is trading at over 30x forward sales. To be sure, there are other things that the company can do to maximize returns for shareholders. It could take SOL out of stake and instead put it into riskier, higher-yield DeFi protocols. It could make investments in companies that build on and grow the Solana ecosystem as well. But, before any of that happens, FORD is probably overpriced at $39 per share. Closing Thoughts It is a very interesting time in the digital asset markets. Publicly listed companies are essentially competing with ETFs and other asset managers for capital to put into the blockchain ecosystem. Part of what makes the share price gains in these smaller cap companies so explosive is that the floats are so small. For example, prior to the PIPE, there were slightly more than 1 million FORD shares outstanding. Now that number is closer to 85 million shares, but the overwhelming majority of them are temporarily locked up. You could talk me into FORD at a moderate premium to the PIPE offering price of $18.50. At closer to $40, I would find alternative ways to get exposure to SOL. I'll initiate with a 'hold.'

title: Stablecoins to take over TradFi after Genius Act approval
body: Stablecoins are slowly but steadily moving into traditional finance (Tradfi) and the financial mainstream, more so after the President Donald Trump-led US administration signed the GENIUS Act into law. The Guaranteeing U.S. Exchange Neutrality for Interconnected and Universal Stablecoins Act , passed in July, is a federal framework that has given institutions and banks clarity on how to issue stablecoins. According to CoinGecko data, the global market for these assets is now valued at $294 billion. Coinbase economists predict the industry could reach $1.2 trillion by 2028. The market is undoubtedly expanding, but Ripple executive Jack McDonald believes not every project meets the standards required for an interoperable, compliant and transparent stablecoin. Many tokens, he argues, are developed for purely hype, which in turn limit their potential. Ripple executive wary of short-sighted stablecoin issuers McDonald, who is the chief executive of Standard Custody & Trust Co. and senior vice-president for stablecoins at Ripple, said many current projects lack vision. Pouring his sentiments in an insight published on Ripple’s website on Wednesday, McDonald reiterated that stablecoins should not be treated as “just a marketing initiative.” Stablecoins carry responsibilities of trust, compliance, and scale. Tokens focused on loyalty programs, gaming economies, or closed ecosystems often fall short of this,” he wrote. The Ripple stablecoins SVP coined the hype-based stablecoins as “isolated islands of value” that fail to connect with broader financial systems, and lack the liquidity, portability, or utility sought in real-world payments. McDonald explained how stablecoins thrive in jurisdictions where financial infrastructure is considered “limited or inefficient” by world standards, because they can bridge access to the US dollar, lower the cost of remittances, and make faster settlements than the slow and expensive banking networks. “The benefits are tangible and measurable,” McDonald continued, “This is where stablecoins can unlock real economic value, and where the need is greatest.” Moreover, he asserted that stablecoins can only succeed if they are interoperable across platforms and networks, transparent about reserves, and capable of scaling as core infrastructure. “These are prerequisites for mainstream adoption and the stability that the term ‘stablecoin’ implies,” the Standard Custody CEO surmised. Concluding his insight, McDonald listed Ripple USD (RLUSD) as the example of a compliance-first token, fully backed 1:1 by U.S. dollar reserves held in reputable US banks. As reported by Cryptopolitan during launch, RLUSD is issued under the supervision of the New York Department of Financial Services and is built on both the XRP Ledger and Ethereum. Ripple says this dual-network issuance makes it flexible for cross-border payments, in tandem with enterprise-grade compliance standards. The UK wants to control stablecoins The stablecoin discussion was also part of The Rollup Podcast’s interview earlier this month with David Grider of Finality Capital, who said “the most interesting thing happening in crypto is TradFi convergence and the unshackling of regulation,” “That’s what’s allowing companies to do DATs and Hype to get their own stablecoin, and it’s also allowing tokenization you are seeing today with Nasdaq. I feel this is pretty exciting for everyone,” the Finality Capital partner reckoned. While the US has created room for stablecoin issuers to thrive, the Bank of England is proposing limits on how many stablecoins individuals and businesses can hold. According to the UK’s central bank, systemic stablecoins could weaken the banking system by draining deposits if left unchecked. Its plan would cap individual holdings at between £10,000 and £20,000, while businesses could be restricted to £10 million. Officials said they intend to press ahead with the policy to “safeguard financial stability,” but for crypto and payments groups, it would leave the UK lagging. “Imposing caps on stablecoins is bad for UK savers, bad for the City and bad for sterling,” said Tom Duff Gordon, vice-president of international policy at Coinbase. The Financial Conduct Authority’s research shows that 93% of UK adults have heard of crypto, and seven million people own some form of it. “Capping stablecoin holdings is how you drive capital away,” complained one naysayer of the BoE’s proposed stablecoin cap on X. Sign up to Bybit and start trading with $30,050 in welcome gifts

title: Why Bitcoin Hyper’s L2 Solution Could Power $BTC’s Next Big Rally
body: Many industry experts and analysts predict $BTC to touch $1M by 2030. Given that it has generated around 188M% returns since 2010 and governments across the world are embracing digital assets, the prediction doesn’t seem far-fetched. But here is the problem: does the Bitcoin blockchain have what it takes to back its growing popularity, at only seven transactions per second (TPS)? The answer is a resounding yes, thanks to Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) . Not only does this new Layer-2 (L2) solution bring more speed and scalability to the Bitcoin blockchain, it also makes it programmable for Web3 innovation. The best part is that the project is still in the early phases with solid technical progress. Bitcoin Hyper offers a low-cost entry into Bitcoin’s journey ahead, making it no surprise that the viral $HYPER token presale has already reached $16.4M+. Why Bitcoin Hyper is Trending Bitcoin Hyper is one of the best new cryptocurrencies to buy this year, with both whales and retail investors in a hurry to secure its native crypto $HYPER. This week alone has seen whale buys of $27.1K and $31.5K . These purchases follow a much bigger transaction last month, where a whale swapped 35.149 $ETH worth $161.3K for $HYPER tokens. What’s fueling this buying frenzy? To understand that, we need to first look at the pain points that Bitcoin Hyper sets out to solve. Bitcoin is a brilliant store of value, as its value appreciation over the years proves. But when it comes to everyday transactions, $BTC doesn’t justify the ‘currency’ in cryptocurrency. Transaction fees can climb so high during busy times that you’d be better off paying with fiat. Bitcoin transactions can also be incredibly slow. $BTC’s seven TPS is dwarfed by Visa’s 65K TPS , making it obvious why its entry into the mainstream as digital cash remains elusive. While Bitcoin is often heralded as the crypto king, real innovation in the blockchain space takes place elsewhere. Interestingly, it has been close to 17 years since the Bitcoin blockchain launched, but it still lacks programmability. Web3 owes its growth to blockchains like Ethereum, Solana, and Cardano for their networks, compatible with smart contracts – not Bitcoin. As a blockchain, Bitcoin is outdated. Developers can’t rely on it for building dApps, DeFi solutions, NFTs, and meme coins. And that’s exactly the reason why Bitcoin Hyper is trending now; it is on a mission to make the Bitcoin blockchain relevant again. The Mechanics of Bitcoin Hyper’s Layer-2 Bitcoin Hyper is a fast, cheap, and secure L2 solution designed for Bitcoin, with two core pillars: The first is a non-custodial Canonical Bridge . You send your $BTC to an address monitored by the Canonical Bridge, and once verified, it’s minted on the L2 as wrapped $BTC. Unlike $BTC, you can use the wrapped $BTC across different applications, from DeFi to NFTs and games. The L2 unlocks Web3 avenues that $BTC never could. When you want your $BTC back, simply withdraw it back to Bitcoin’s native Layer-1, any time you choose. The second is the Solana Virtual Machine , which brings Solana-level performance to Bitcoin. For developers familiar with Solana’s framework and tools, it will be easy to build apps onto Bitcoin Hyper. Near-instant execution and low fees are added incentives. Visit the Bitcoin Hyper website to learn more about the L2 infrastructure. Solid Tech Progress Justifies the FOMO The crypto market is a decentralized space where anyone can launch a project. Low entry barriers lead to innovation, but they can also overcrowd the market with substandard projects. Investors who have watched the crypto market for a while know that new projects are not to be judged by the promises they make. Their dev updates matter more than their roadmap. It is for this reason, strategic investors are buying $HYPER tokens before it hits exchanges. Here is what we can expect next: Better roll-up sequencing models, refined for anchoring to Bitcoin’s base layer Stronger dev workflows for SVM-compatible contracts, from deployment to monitoring Lightweight infra services (RPC, indexers, explorers) to help developers interact with Hyper efficiently Pathway for early builders to test contracts and infra components before the mainnet launch. In addition, the project has undergone two smart contract audits by leading blockchain security firms Coinsult and SpyWolf . The reports clear any concerns investors may have around rug pulls and code traps – both genuine risks in the crypto space. Backed by a strong project with consistent tech progress, it wouldn’t be surprising to see $HYPER explode on its initial exchange listings. According to our Bitcoin Hyper price prediction , $HYPER could make a 28x gain from its presale price, hitting $0.32 by the year-end. $16.4M Raised: The Presale Window is Now Open – But Not For Long The $HYPER presale is racing ahead, with growing support from Bitcoin investors. They are making a strategic move with the new token, as it is closely tied to Bitcoin’s brand value and utility. The pro-crypto shift across the world hints at Bitcoin’s mainstream adoption. For example, Japan plans to cut crypto taxes from 55% to 20%, and the new rule treats crypto gains similarly to stock gains. The US, on the other hand, is on a mission to become the crypto capital of the world. SEC Chair Paul Atkins reiterated this goal in his keynote address at the inaugural OECD Roundtable on Global Financial Markets . ‘An invasion of armies can be resisted, but not an idea whose time has come. And today, ladies and gentlemen, we must admit that: crypto’s time has come.’ – Paul Atkins, SEC Chair As Bitcoin climbs up the charts, $HYPER is expected to follow. But here is the distinction. Bitcoin has a gigantic market cap of $2.3T , which limits its pace, while Bitcoin Hyper is a small-cap project with more room for returns. The tokenomics is designed with eyes set on long-term growth and value appreciation. Waiting until the exchange listing, however, might be a bad idea, as the residual FOMO from the presale could push the token price exponentially. The dynamic staking program also encourages early investments with higher APYs. Right now you can buy $HYPER for $0.012935 and unlock a juicy 70% staking APY. Our How to Buy Bitcoin Hyper guide explains how to do just that. Being a presale, though, the price rises in stages while the APY lowers as more holders stake their tokens. And the next price surge is less than two days away. So early action is key. Ready to join the presale? Buy your $HYPER via the official Bitcoin Hyper website today. Authored by Bogdan Patru, Bitcoinist – https://bitcoinist.com/bitcoin-hyper-l2-can-save-troubled-bitcoin

title: Astar Token Claim: Unlock Your Exciting ASTER Opportunity Today!
body: BitcoinWorld Astar Token Claim: Unlock Your Exciting ASTER Opportunity Today! Connect Your Wallet: Securely link your compatible cryptocurrency wallet. Most claims support popular wallets like MetaMask or WalletConnect-enabled options. Review and Confirm: Double-check the amount of ASTER tokens available for you and confirm the transaction. What Challenges Might You Face During the Astar Token Claim? While the Astar token claim presents significant opportunities, users should be aware of potential challenges. Technical Issues: Wallet compatibility problems or minor glitches can sometimes occur. Ensure your wallet software is up to date. Eligibility Criteria: Some users might mistakenly believe they are eligible when they do not meet specific requirements. Carefully read the official eligibility terms. It is vital to stay informed and follow best security practices to ensure a smooth and secure claiming experience. By being prepared, you can mitigate these risks effectively. The opening of the Astar token claim is a significant event for the Astar community, empowering users with greater participation and ownership within its innovative DeFi ecosystem. By carefully following official guidelines and understanding both the opportunities and potential pitfalls, ASTER holders can successfully claim their tokens and become an even more integral part of Astar’s future. This marks not just a distribution, but a crucial step forward in decentralization and community engagement. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is the ASTER token? ASTER is the native utility token of Astar’s decentralized perpetual futures exchange. It is designed for various functions including governance, staking, and providing utility within the protocol. Who is eligible for the Astar token claim? Eligibility for the Astar token claim is determined by specific criteria set by the Astar project. These often include past participation in the ecosystem, holding certain assets, or other specified actions. Always refer to official Astar announcements for precise details. How can I ensure I’m using the official Astar token claim portal? To ensure security, always access the claim portal through links provided on Astar’s official website, verified social media channels (like X), or reputable crypto news outlets. Double-check the URL for any discrepancies before connecting your wallet or entering information. Are there any fees associated with claiming ASTER tokens? Yes, you will typically need to pay network transaction fees, also known as gas fees, to process your Astar token claim. These fees are paid in the native cryptocurrency of the blockchain Astar operates on and vary based on network congestion. What can I do with my ASTER tokens after claiming them? After successfully claiming your ASTER tokens, you have several options. You can hold them, stake them to potentially earn rewards, use them for governance voting within the Astar ecosystem, or utilize them within the decentralized exchange for benefits like reduced trading fees. title: Market Watch: BNB Hits New ATH, BTC Eyes $117K Before FOMC
body: With just hours left until the highly anticipated FOMC meeting scheduled for later today, bitcoin’s price jumped to a new multi-week peak of just over $117,200. Most altcoins have failed to produce any big moves over the past day, while BNB charted a new all-time high, and HYPE has neared its own. BTC Stopped at $117K The primary cryptocurrency has been on an evident uptrend for the past week or so, after bouncing off the $111,000 support last Tuesday. The asset started to recover some of the recently lost ground almost immediately and had risen to over $116,000 by Friday. It failed there at first and remained sideways for most of the weekend, at least after it jumped to $116,800 on Saturday morning, where it was quickly stopped. The bulls went on the offensive on Monday, but the subsequent rejection at the same level pushed BTC south to $114,400. However, bitcoin recovered again and headed north to just over $117,200 earlier today, which became a four-week peak. Although it has slipped slightly since then, it’s still in the green on a daily scale. More volatility is expected later today when the US Federal Reserve will announce whether it will indeed lower the interest rates as many anticipate. For now, though, BTC’s market cap sits at just over $2.325 trillion on CG, while its dominance over the alts is up to 56.2%. BTCUSD. Source: TradingView BNB New Peak Most larger-cap alts have remained at essentially the same price levels as yesterday, including ETH, XRP, SOL, ADA, DOGE, TRX, and SUI. In contrast, BNB topped $960 earlier today to mark a new all-time high. HYPE also neared its own record but now trades at $55. LINK, AVAX, XLM, and HBAR are slightly in the red on a daily scale. MYX has skyrocketed the most from the larger-cap alts, gaining over 50% in a day to trade above $16. IP and SKY are far behind with 6% and 5%, respectively. The total crypto market cap has risen to $4.140 trillion on CG, gaining more than $140 billion in the past several days. Cryptocurrency Market Overview. Source: QuantifyCrypto The post Market Watch: BNB Hits New ATH, BTC Eyes $117K Before FOMC appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Open-Source Password Manager: Tether CEO Unveils Secure PearPass Launch Soon
body: BitcoinWorld Open-Source Password Manager: Tether CEO Unveils Secure PearPass Launch Soon In an exciting development for digital security, Paolo Ardoino, the CEO of Tether, has officially announced the imminent launch of PearPass. This groundbreaking open-source password manager promises to revolutionize how we protect our sensitive information online. It’s a significant move, especially for those of us navigating the complex and often vulnerable landscape of digital finance and cryptocurrency. Ardoino shared the news on X, highlighting his long-standing commitment to developing a robust solution. His motivation? To combat the persistent threat of password leaks from centralized platforms. This initiative could not come at a better time, as digital breaches continue to plague users worldwide, making the need for a truly secure and transparent system more urgent than ever. What Makes an Open-Source Password Manager a Game-Changer? When we talk about an open-source password manager , we are discussing a tool built on transparency and community collaboration. Unlike proprietary software, where the code remains hidden, open-source projects allow anyone to inspect, verify, and contribute to the code. This fundamental difference fosters a level of trust and security that closed systems often struggle to achieve. PearPass aims to leverage this transparency to provide unparalleled protection. The idea is simple yet powerful: the more eyes on the code, the faster vulnerabilities can be identified and fixed. This collective vigilance is a cornerstone of the open-source philosophy, ensuring that the software is constantly scrutinized and improved by a global community of experts. Why Digital Security is Paramount in the Crypto Space For anyone involved in cryptocurrencies, digital security isn’t just a convenience; it’s an absolute necessity. The decentralized nature of digital assets means that users bear the primary responsibility for their own security. A single password leak can lead to devastating financial losses, often irreversible. Centralized platforms, while convenient, inherently introduce points of failure. If a platform’s security is compromised, all user data stored there becomes vulnerable. Ardoino’s vision for PearPass directly addresses this critical concern, offering users a powerful tool to take back control of their digital identities and assets. It’s about empowering individuals with better, more reliable defenses. The Vision Behind PearPass: A New Era for Password Safety Paolo Ardoino has been vocal about his concerns regarding the current state of password management. He previously indicated his intention to develop a tool specifically designed to prevent the widespread issue of password compromises from centralized services. PearPass is the culmination of that vision, promising a fresh approach to digital safeguarding. While specific features are still under wraps, the core promise of PearPass as an open-source password manager suggests a focus on user control, strong encryption, and auditability. Imagine a system where your passwords are not only securely stored but also managed in a way that minimizes reliance on third-party trust. This is the future Ardoino envisions for digital identity protection. What Are the Benefits of Choosing an Open-Source Password Manager ? The advantages of an open-source approach to password management are numerous and compelling: Unrivaled Transparency: The code is publicly available for anyone to review, ensuring no hidden backdoors or malicious functionalities. Community Auditing: Security researchers and enthusiasts can constantly audit the code, leading to faster identification and patching of vulnerabilities. Enhanced Trust: Knowing that the software’s inner workings are transparent builds greater confidence among users, especially for sensitive data like passwords. Greater Customization: Open-source tools often offer more flexibility for users to adapt the software to their specific needs. No Vendor Lock-in: Users are not tied to a single company’s ecosystem, fostering freedom and interoperability. Preparing for the Launch of This Innovative Open-Source Password Manager As the launch of PearPass approaches, it’s an excellent time for individuals and businesses alike to reassess their current password security practices. This upcoming open-source password manager could represent a significant upgrade for many, offering a robust alternative to existing solutions. Keep an eye on official announcements from Paolo Ardoino and Tether for specific launch details and how to get involved. Embracing tools like PearPass is a proactive step towards building a more secure digital future for everyone, particularly in an environment where cyber threats are constantly evolving. The introduction of PearPass by Tether’s CEO marks a pivotal moment for digital security. By championing an open-source approach, Paolo Ardoino is not just launching a product; he’s advocating for a more transparent, trustworthy, and user-centric method of protecting our most valuable digital assets. This move could inspire a new standard for password management, offering a beacon of hope in the ongoing battle against cybercrime. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is PearPass? PearPass is an upcoming open-source password manager announced by Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino, designed to provide a secure and transparent solution for managing digital passwords and preventing leaks from centralized platforms. Q2: Why is an open-source password manager considered more secure? Open-source software allows its code to be publicly reviewed and audited by a global community. This transparency helps identify and fix vulnerabilities faster than proprietary, closed-source alternatives, fostering greater trust and security. Q3: Who is Paolo Ardoino? Paolo Ardoino is the CEO of Tether, the company behind the USDT stablecoin. He is a prominent figure in the cryptocurrency industry, known for his focus on technological development and security. Q4: When is PearPass expected to launch? According to Paolo Ardoino’s announcement on X, PearPass is scheduled to launch soon. Specific dates are yet to be revealed, and interested users should monitor official channels for updates. Q5: How can PearPass help protect my cryptocurrency assets? By providing a highly secure and transparent way to manage your login credentials, PearPass can significantly reduce the risk of your passwords being compromised. This is crucial for protecting access to cryptocurrency exchanges, wallets, and other related platforms. If you found this article insightful, consider sharing it with your network! Help us spread the word about the importance of digital security and the potential impact of this new open-source password manager . To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption. This post Open-Source Password Manager: Tether CEO Unveils Secure PearPass Launch Soon first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Bitcoin Perde Slancio a Favore di Ethereum e Altcoin: i Dati Sui Futures lo Confermano
body: I dati recenti mostrano che Bitcoin sta perdendo interesse rispetto a Ethereum e alle altcoin, con il loro volume combinato di futures che ha superato l’85% del totale. Ethereum e altcoin registrano un aumento del volume dei futures In un post su X , l’analista della community CryptoQuant, Maartunn , ha discusso dell’ultima tendenza nel volume dei futures di Ethereum e delle altcoin.Con “volume dei futures” si intende la quantità di trading legata ai contratti derivati sulle principali piattaforme di scambio. Il grafico condiviso da Maartunn mostra come negli ultimi anni il dominanza del volume dei futures di ETH e delle altcoin abbia subito variazioni: Negli ultimi giorni, il volume dei futures delle altcoin ha registrato un forte aumento, indicando un rinnovato interesse speculativo verso queste monete. Ethereum, pur non avendo raggiunto i picchi passati, ha comunque registrato un leggero incremento contemporaneo alla crescita delle altcoin. Combinati, ETH e le altcoin ora rappresentano circa l’85,2% del volume totale dei futures crypto, lasciando Bitcoin sotto il 15% di dominanza. Storicamente, periodi simili sono stati un cattivo segnale non solo per BTC, ma per l’intero mercato, come evidenziato dai grafici dei massimi di prezzo della fine del 2024 e dell’estate 2025. Questo suggerisce che, considerando il predominio di Ethereum e altcoin nei futures, Bitcoin e altri asset potrebbero affrontare maggiore volatilità nei prossimi giorni. Attività di sviluppo dei progetti crypto In altre notizie, la società di analisi on-chain Santiment ha condiviso su X un aggiornamento sull’ attività di sviluppo dei vari progetti crypto.Questo indicatore misura quanto lavoro stanno facendo gli sviluppatori sui repository pubblici GitHub dei progetti. L’unità di misura è l’ “evento” , ovvero qualsiasi azione compiuta dagli sviluppatori, come un commit o la creazione di un fork. Secondo la tabella pubblicata da Santiment: Ethereum si piazza solo al 10° posto per attività di sviluppo negli ultimi 30 giorni, nonostante sia il secondo progetto per capitalizzazione di mercato dopo Bitcoin. Il progetto con maggiore attività degli sviluppatori è Internet Computer (ICP) , con valori quasi tre volte superiori a quelli di ETH. Prezzo di Ethereum Il prezzo di Ethereum al momento della stesura dell’articolo è di 4.501$

title: Mantle Mainnet Upgrade: A Revolutionary Leap Towards ZK Rollup Technology
body: BitcoinWorld Mantle Mainnet Upgrade: A Revolutionary Leap Towards ZK Rollup Technology The world of blockchain technology is constantly evolving, pushing the boundaries of what’s possible for decentralized applications. Recently, a significant milestone was achieved that’s set to reshape the landscape: the successful Mantle mainnet upgrade . This pivotal development marks a crucial step for Mantle (MNT), signaling a bold move towards a more efficient and scalable future for its ecosystem. What’s Behind the Mantle Mainnet Upgrade? Mantle’s official blog proudly announced the completion of its mainnet upgrade, a move that leverages cutting-edge OP Succinct technology. This isn’t just a minor tweak; it’s a fundamental shift in its underlying architecture. Previously operating as an Optimistic Rollup, Mantle had clearly stated its ambition to transition into a ZK Rollup. This comprehensive upgrade makes that vision a reality, setting a new standard for Layer 2 solutions. Why is This Mantle Mainnet Upgrade a Game-Changer? The transition from an Optimistic Rollup to a ZK Rollup, facilitated by the Mantle mainnet upgrade, brings a host of compelling advantages. Think of it as moving from a system that assumes honesty and verifies only if challenged, to one that mathematically proves honesty from the start. This inherent difference leads to substantial improvements. Here are some key benefits: Enhanced Security: ZK Rollups offer a higher degree of cryptographic security. Transactions are verified using zero-knowledge proofs, making them incredibly robust against fraud and ensuring data integrity. Superior Scalability: By bundling thousands of transactions off-chain and then submitting a single, concise proof to the Ethereum mainnet, Mantle can process significantly more transactions per second. This dramatically reduces network congestion and improves throughput. Faster Finality: With ZK Rollups, transactions are considered final almost immediately on the Layer 2, as their validity is cryptographically assured. This significantly improves user experience and application responsiveness. Reduced Costs: Increased efficiency and reduced data posted to the mainnet often translate to lower transaction fees for users. This makes interacting with the Mantle network more accessible and affordable. This Mantle mainnet upgrade positions Mantle as a frontrunner in the race for scalable blockchain solutions, offering a powerful combination of speed, security, and cost-effectiveness. Navigating the Transition: The Mantle Mainnet Upgrade Journey Undertaking a mainnet upgrade of this magnitude is no small feat. It involves meticulous planning, rigorous testing, and seamless execution to ensure stability and functionality. The decision to adopt OP Succinct wasn’t made lightly; it represents a strategic choice to embrace a more advanced, cryptographically sound scaling solution. Developers and engineers at Mantle worked tirelessly to ensure a smooth transition, minimizing disruption while maximizing the long-term benefits for the ecosystem. This successful Mantle mainnet upgrade demonstrates their unwavering commitment to innovation and delivering a superior blockchain experience. What Does This Mantle Mainnet Upgrade Mean for You? Whether you’re a developer building decentralized applications (dApps), a user interacting with the Mantle network, or an investor holding MNT tokens, this upgrade has direct implications that promise a better experience across the board. For Developers: Expect a more robust and scalable environment for deploying and running dApps. This potentially opens up new possibilities for complex applications that demand high throughput and lower operational costs. For Users: Anticipate quicker transaction confirmations and potentially lower gas fees, leading to a smoother and more cost-effective experience across various Mantle-based platforms and applications. For the Ecosystem: The enhanced capabilities from the Mantle mainnet upgrade are likely to attract more projects and users. This influx will foster greater growth, innovation, and a more vibrant community within the Mantle ecosystem. It’s a significant step forward that aims to benefit everyone involved, reinforcing Mantle’s vision for a decentralized future. The successful Mantle mainnet upgrade, transitioning to a ZK Rollup with OP Succinct, marks a truly transformative moment for the network. It solidifies Mantle’s position at the forefront of Layer 2 scaling solutions, offering unparalleled security, scalability, and efficiency. This significant achievement not only enhances the user and developer experience but also paves the way for a more vibrant and robust decentralized future. The journey ahead for Mantle looks incredibly promising, as it continues to innovate and push the boundaries of blockchain technology. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What is a ZK Rollup? A ZK Rollup (Zero-Knowledge Rollup) is a Layer 2 scaling solution for blockchains like Ethereum. It bundles hundreds or thousands of off-chain transactions into a single batch and generates a cryptographic proof (a zero-knowledge proof) of their validity. This proof is then submitted to the mainnet, significantly reducing the data that needs to be processed on-chain and enhancing scalability and efficiency. 2. How does OP Succinct contribute to Mantle’s upgrade? OP Succinct is the technology utilized by Mantle to facilitate its transition from an Optimistic Rollup to a ZK Rollup. It plays a crucial role in enabling the generation and verification of the zero-knowledge proofs required for the ZK Rollup architecture, ensuring the security and efficiency of the upgraded network. 3. What are the main benefits of Mantle’s transition to a ZK Rollup? The primary benefits include enhanced security through cryptographic proofs, superior scalability allowing for more transactions per second, faster transaction finality on Layer 2, and potentially reduced transaction costs for users due to increased efficiency. 4. Will the Mantle mainnet upgrade affect my existing MNT tokens or dApps? The Mantle mainnet upgrade is designed to be a seamless transition, aiming to improve the network’s performance without negatively impacting existing MNT tokens or decentralized applications (dApps) deployed on the network. Users and developers should experience improved efficiency and potentially lower fees. 5. What is the future outlook for Mantle after this upgrade? The successful Mantle mainnet upgrade positions Mantle as a leading Layer 2 solution with advanced scalability and security features. This is expected to attract more developers, projects, and users to the ecosystem, fostering innovation and accelerating its growth within the broader blockchain space. This groundbreaking Mantle mainnet upgrade is a topic worth discussing! Share this article with your friends, colleagues, and anyone interested in the future of blockchain technology and Layer 2 scaling solutions. Let’s spread the word about Mantle’s innovative leap forward! To learn more about the latest blockchain scaling solutions trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Layer 2 networks innovation. This post Mantle Mainnet Upgrade: A Revolutionary Leap Towards ZK Rollup Technology first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Apple sees 6% drop in China iPhone sales before iPhone 17 release
body: Apple’s iPhone business in China just took a punch to the gut. Sales dropped 6% year-over-year in the two months leading up to the global launch of the iPhone 17, according to data from Counterpoint Research. That dip hit harder than what the company usually sees before a new model drops. The pullback happened in July and August, weeks before Apple’s new lineup is set to go live this Friday, September 19. And it wasn’t just Apple. Chinese brands like Xiaomi, Vivo, and Honor also had slower numbers, which dragged the entire market down 2% in the same period, despite government-backed incentives meant to push more people to buy. China matters to Apple more than anywhere outside the U.S., and the latest numbers show it’s becoming a tougher place to win. CEO Tim Cook told investors during Apple’s latest earnings call that the company saw a short-term sales recovery in China during the June quarter, helped by subsidies. But even with that bounce, Apple still landed in sixth place over the summer, owning just 12% of the market. Chinese rivals were ahead: Xiaomi, Oppo, and Huawei each grabbed 16%, while Vivo led with 19%. Xiaomi fast-tracks its release after Apple’s announcement To stay competitive, Xiaomi pushed up its next flagship launch to this month. Lei Jun, the company’s co-founder and CEO, said he wants Xiaomi phones to be judged next to Apple’s top-tier devices. The iPhone 17 lineup is Apple’s biggest hardware shake-up in years, with four different models rolling out: the regular iPhone 17, the thinner Air, the higher-end Pro, and the super-sized Pro Max. Every single one of them runs on Apple’s updated in-house chips, has better cameras, and comes wrapped in tougher glass. Preorders started September 12. The company also tweaked its pricing. Most models kept last year’s pricing, but the iPhone 17 Pro now starts at $1,099, which is $100 higher than before. That version now ships with 256GB of storage, matching the price of last year’s 256GB iPhone 16 Pro. The global release date for all four models is September 19. On that same day, Bloomberg reporters got hands-on time with the new devices during Apple’s media event, which also showed off the newest AirPods Pro and updated Apple Watch models. Those first impressions focused on the hardware upgrades, especially the new body build and camera system, but didn’t mention much about software features. Apple’s AI suite missing in China but buyers don’t care yet One major gap still looms large. Apple hasn’t rolled out its Apple Intelligence features in China yet. But so far, that hasn’t seemed to affect how people are buying phones. Analysts from Counterpoint say Chinese consumers are still looking at basics like battery life, storage, and value for money. None of the major brands are seeing AI features drive sales. That means Apple’s lack of AI in China isn’t hurting … yet. Even so, the broader Chinese smartphone market is still weak. Counterpoint expects sales across the country to drop slightly for the full third quarter. There’s no major change happening this year, and no signs that a single product, iPhone or otherwise, is going to turn that around. Cook told investors that Apple’s customer base in Greater China hit a record in the last quarter. He said, “If you look at the other products, Mac, iPad, and Watch, the majority of customers that are buying in China mainland were new to the product.” So Apple’s still pulling in first-time buyers for its other devices, even if the iPhone is losing ground. The problem is, Chinese phone makers aren’t sitting still. They’re speeding up launches, matching specs, cutting prices, and competing more aggressively than ever. Apple is still chasing the lead in a market where value sells more than hype, and features matter more than branding. If you're reading this, you’re already ahead. Stay there with our newsletter .

title: UK Crypto Regulation: A Pivotal Shift for Innovation and Growth
body: BitcoinWorld UK Crypto Regulation: A Pivotal Shift for Innovation and Growth Exciting news is emerging from the United Kingdom that could reshape the landscape for digital asset businesses. The UK’s Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) is reportedly planning to ease some of its rules for cryptocurrency companies, signaling a more adaptable approach to UK crypto regulation . This move aims to foster innovation within the burgeoning crypto sector while still upholding essential financial stability and consumer protection. What’s Changing in UK Crypto Regulation? According to reports from the Financial Times, the FCA’s proposal suggests a more tailored regulatory environment for crypto firms. This isn’t a complete deregulation but rather a strategic adjustment, recognizing the unique operational models of digital asset companies compared to traditional financial institutions. Less Stringent Oversight: Crypto firms might face less rigorous requirements than banks or established investment platforms, particularly concerning senior management responsibilities and internal systems and controls. Targeted Approach: This differentiation acknowledges that a ‘one-size-fits-all’ approach might stifle growth in a rapidly evolving sector like cryptocurrency. Balancing Act: The goal is to strike a balance, allowing crypto businesses more operational flexibility without compromising core regulatory objectives. Why is the FCA Adjusting its Stance on UK Crypto Regulation? The decision to revisit existing rules stems from a broader governmental push to establish the UK as a global hub for crypto and blockchain innovation. By creating a more accommodating regulatory framework, the FCA hopes to attract leading crypto firms and talent, encouraging investment and job creation within the country. This strategic shift in UK crypto regulation is a testament to the growing recognition of digital assets’ potential. It reflects an understanding that an overly restrictive environment can push innovation offshore, leading to a loss of economic opportunity. Where Will Stricter Rules Still Apply? While some areas may see a loosening of controls, it is crucial to understand that the FCA is not abandoning its commitment to security and market integrity. In fact, certain critical areas will face even stricter oversight to protect consumers and the financial system. Cybersecurity Measures: Expect heightened regulations concerning cyberattacks and data security. As digital assets are prime targets for malicious actors, robust defenses are paramount. Consumer Protection: The FCA will likely maintain or enhance rules designed to safeguard retail investors from fraud, market manipulation, and misleading promotions. Anti-Money Laundering (AML) & Counter-Terrorist Financing (CTF): These areas are consistently high priorities for regulators globally, and the UK will continue to enforce stringent measures to prevent illicit financial activities. The proposed framework for UK crypto regulation seeks to differentiate between the risks associated with operational management and those related to market integrity and cyber threats. What Does This Mean for Crypto Firms in the UK? For cryptocurrency companies operating or looking to establish themselves in the UK, these proposed changes could be a significant boon. They signal a more welcoming environment and potentially reduced compliance burdens in specific administrative areas. However, it also means a clear expectation of excellence in critical security and compliance domains. Firms should view this as an opportunity to engage constructively with the regulator, understand the nuances of the new rules, and demonstrate their commitment to responsible innovation. Adapting quickly to evolving UK crypto regulation will be key to success. The Future of UK Crypto Regulation: A Balancing Act This planned easing of rules represents a thoughtful evolution in the UK’s approach to digital assets. It moves away from a broad, often ill-fitting application of traditional financial regulations towards a more bespoke framework. The aim is to create a regulatory landscape that is both progressive and secure, positioning the UK as a leader in the global crypto space. The journey towards optimal UK crypto regulation is ongoing, but these developments indicate a positive direction. It’s a clear signal that the UK intends to be at the forefront of the digital finance revolution, fostering an environment where innovation can thrive responsibly. In summary, the FCA’s proposed adjustments to UK crypto regulation are a nuanced and strategic move. They promise a more flexible operating environment for crypto firms in some aspects, while simultaneously reinforcing robust safeguards in critical areas like cybersecurity. This forward-thinking approach aims to cement the UK’s position as a hub for digital asset innovation, benefiting both businesses and the broader economy. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the main goal of the FCA’s proposed changes to UK crypto regulation? The main goal is to balance fostering innovation within the UK’s cryptocurrency sector with maintaining robust financial stability and consumer protection. It aims to create a more tailored regulatory environment for crypto firms. Q2: How will these changes make rules less stringent for crypto firms? Under the proposal, crypto firms may face less stringent rules than traditional banks or investment platforms regarding senior managers, systems, and controls, recognizing their unique operational models. Q3: In which areas will UK crypto regulation become stricter? Stricter regulations are anticipated in critical areas such as cybersecurity measures to combat cyberattacks and robust controls for anti-money laundering (AML) and counter-terrorist financing (CTF) to protect market integrity. Q4: Why is the UK government encouraging these regulatory changes? The UK government aims to establish the country as a global hub for crypto and blockchain innovation. By creating a more accommodating regulatory framework, it seeks to attract leading crypto firms, investment, and talent. Q5: When are these changes to UK crypto regulation expected to take effect? The Financial Times reported on these plans, but specific timelines for implementation are typically subject to public consultation periods and official announcements from the FCA. Interested parties should monitor official FCA communications for updates. If you found this article insightful, please consider sharing it with your network on social media. Your shares help us spread valuable information about the evolving world of cryptocurrency and regulation. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. This post UK Crypto Regulation: A Pivotal Shift for Innovation and Growth first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Is XRP Becoming A Privacy Coin? Ripple’s New Proposal Says Yes—And No
body: Ripple’s developer arm has floated a blueprint to bring privacy-coin-like functionality to the XRP Ledger—without abandoning the network’s long-standing emphasis on public supply integrity and compliance tooling. In a new XRP Ledger Standards (XRPLF) discussion opened on September 13, Ripple engineers Murat Cenk and Aanchal Malhotra propose “Confidential Multi-Purpose Tokens (MPTs),” an amendment that would encrypt balances and transfer amounts using EC-ElGamal and zero-knowledge proofs, while preserving the accounting semantics of XRPL’s existing MPT framework. RippleX subsequently highlighted the proposal on X, drawing mainstream attention to what could be the most consequential privacy addition yet considered for XRPL. Is XRP Becoming A Privacy Coin? At its core, the draft introduces confidentiality at the token layer without obscuring aggregate supply. Confidential MPTs provide confidential transfers and balances using EC-ElGamal encryption and Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKPs), while preserving XLS-33 semantics,” the authors write. Crucially, they stress that “Public auditability” remains intact because issuance limits continue to be enforced by the network’s existing invariant—OutstandingAmount never exceeding MaxAmount—so validators can verify that no new tokens are silently minted even if individual balances are encrypted. The design leans on a practical architectural compromise. Instead of redefining supply math for a private system, issuers would maintain a designated “second account” that the ledger treats like any other holder. Public supply metrics, including OutstandingAmount, then account for both public and confidential balances, with a new ConfidentialOutstandingAmount field tracking the private portion. This lets validators enforce the same XLS-33 rule set they already understand, while transactions themselves rely on equality proofs and range proofs to ensure spends are valid without revealing amounts. The proposal is explicit about the “twist” that differentiates it from pure privacy chains such as Monero or Zcash : selective disclosure and issuer controls are built in. The spec outlines two auditor models—an on-chain, trust-minimized approach that supports pre-defined auditors and later additions via re-encryption, and a simpler issuer-controlled “view key” option. It also proposes issuer-only freeze and clawback capabilities over confidential balances, framed as compliance tools rather than discretionary surveillance. In the authors’ words, the system enables “flexible auditability” while keeping private balances “encrypted under the holder’s key,” with optional auditor copies of the same ciphertext verifiably bound via ZK equality proofs. To make the flow reliable at scale, the draft adopts a split-balance model that separates a holder’s encrypted funds into a spendable “Spending” balance and an “Inbox” for new incoming transfers. A lightweight merge operation prevents “stale proof” failures that can occur when a new receipt lands while a user is preparing a proof for an outgoing transfer. That operational detail, commonplace in high-throughput confidential systems, suggests the authors are mindful of UX and wallet-developer realities, not just cryptographic elegance. If advanced, the change would arrive as an XRPL amendment and need to clear the ledger’s formal governance hurdle: more than 80% validator approval sustained for two weeks before activation on mainnet. Nothing in the discussion implies a live vote yet; the status is “Discussion,” and any production path would first require code landing in a stable server release. Context matters here. The multi-purpose token standard (XLS-33, “MPT”) already equips XRPL with a more compact, compliance-aware fungible token primitive than legacy trustlines, including allow-lists, freeze and clawback, and on-chain metadata. Confidential MPTs don’t replace that model; they extend it. The ledger would continue to expose supply caps and enforce invariants even as per-account balances become opaque, aiming squarely at institutional tokenization where privacy, auditability, and policy controls must coexist. Technically—and politically—the framing invites the obvious question in the headline. Is XRP becoming a privacy coin? The honest answer is ambivalent by design. On one hand, balances and amounts would be encrypted end-to-end, with ZKPs securing the flow—indistinguishable at a glance from what privacy coins promise. On the other hand, the draft hardwires audit channels and issuer recourse that privacy-maximalist communities typically reject, and it preserves validator-enforced supply checks that make “stealth inflation” mathematically impossible. That is the “Yes—and No” in a nutshell. At press time, XRP traded at $3.01.
tags: XRP|Confidential MPT|ripple|ripple news|RippleX|XRP Ledger|XRP Ledger news|XRP news|XRP price

title: Which Crypto to Buy Today for Short-Term? SOL Can Pump 10% But Institutes Are Rotating To an Altcoin Already 3.5x Up
body: When traders check crypto charts or ask what is going on with crypto today, many are eyeing SOL for a potential 10% swing. That’s attractive for day traders chasing momentum. But institutions—who tend to think beyond short-term fluctuations—are shifting their attention toward Mutuum Finance (MUTM) . This presale altcoin has already delivered a 3.5x return to early buyers before even listing, showing the kind of acceleration that SOL’s modest pump cannot compete with. For serious investors, the real question is not about chasing 10% gains, but about entering into a platform designed with structural safeguards and long-term capital flow in mind. Why Institutions Are Choosing MUTM Over SOL’s Small Swings Consider the numbers: a $20,000 investment during Phase 2 of Mutuum Finance (MUTM) at $0.015 secured 1.33 million tokens. Today, in Phase 6, with the presale price at $0.035, that same allocation is worth $46,600. That’s 3.5x returns before launch—returns far beyond the 10% SOL swing traders are watching. The presale itself has momentum, with $15.85 million already raised, 40% of the supply sold, and over 16,350 holders. With Phase 7 approaching, the price will climb to $0.040, a 15% increase from today’s level. Institutions are not waiting for that shift—they are positioning now. Their reasoning is simple: Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is not only offering high returns in the presale, it is also structured with features that directly appeal to institutional risk frameworks. The platform introduces deposit and borrow caps alongside restricted collateral lists, which means lending operations will remain within controlled limits. Institutions value these guardrails because they reduce exposure to sudden liquidity crunches and ensure that only vetted assets, such as leading cryptocurrencies and stablecoins, are accepted as collateral. This prevents low-quality or volatile assets from destabilizing the system, creating the kind of risk-controlled environment that funds demand. Another innovation that strengthens Mutuum Finance (MUTM)’s appeal is Enhanced Collateral Efficiency. Traditional DeFi protocols often lock excess collateral that sits idle, reducing capital efficiency. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will change that by allowing borrowers to unlock greater borrowing power relative to the value of their collateral. For institutions, this means being able to deploy larger positions without requiring disproportionate amounts of locked-up capital. The result is a more active borrowing market, more lending activity, and higher overall protocol usage—all of which generate recurring revenue streams for the platform and boost demand for MUTM tokens. Complementing this is the utilization-based interest model, which dynamically adjusts rates depending on how much liquidity is being used. When liquidity is abundant, borrowing rates will be lower, encouraging borrowers to take on loans. When liquidity becomes scarce, rates increase, incentivizing lenders to supply more capital. This feedback loop ensures balance in the system, preventing scenarios where either side of the market is neglected. For institutions, this adaptability is crucial because it guarantees market stability even during volatile times. Rather than being locked into rigid rate structures, they will operate in an ecosystem that naturally regulates itself to attract and maintain liquidity. Beta Launch and Layer-2 Efficiency: Why Timing Matters Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is not waiting until long after listing to roll out features. A beta version will already be live at token launch, allowing users to test lending and stablecoin functions from day one. This readiness makes the token even more attractive to institutions, who want to see practical use cases in action before committing large sums. Unlike other presales that raise funds first and build later, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will present a working foundation immediately, accelerating adoption. Layer-2 integration is another key factor in this early adoption story. Operating on Layer-2 ensures faster transactions and lower costs than traditional Layer-1 blockchains, an essential feature for funds managing large-scale activity. Reduced transaction fees and near-instant execution provide an edge in efficiency that will appeal both to institutions and to retail investors seeking smoother experiences. In contrast, while SOL’s 10% swing is drawing short-term excitement, it does not offer the structural growth opportunities that Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is already providing. SOL is a mature asset with steady movements, while MUTM is a rising token combining safety mechanisms, efficiency upgrades, and adoption-ready features. That combination explains why institutions are rotating early into MUTM, while retail traders still have a narrowing window at $0.035 before Phase 7 pushes the price higher. The choice for short-term investors is becoming clear. SOL may deliver its 10%, but the real gains are already unfolding in Mutuum Finance (MUTM)’s presale. With 3.5x growth locked in for early buyers and institutional rotation underway, retail investors only have days to align with the same opportunity before the price climbs again. In a market that often punishes hesitation, this is the moment to act decisively.
